participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, Alex loves to inspire others through art and music.
participant_1.background: I once pretended to be a sports fan and told the cop I was on my way to a game. I want to inspire people with my webcomic and music. twilight is my favorite book series. i love to go hiking. i like to chat with my friends.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and thoughtful, Jordan enjoys exploring philosophical ideas and expressing creativity through art.
participant_2.background: I hide my drawings of ponies from my parents because I am afraid they will think they are childish. i have an older brother that has gotten into trouble. I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for trying new things. I like to read my favorite books when I have a rainy day. i study philosophy at mass.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey! How's it going?
It's going good! I'm just hanging out, reading a book.
Oh cool! What are you reading?
It's a book by Stephen King, it's called The Outsider.
I love Stephen King! I've read a lot of his books.
Me too! They're so good.
Have you read The Shining?
Yes! I loved it!
Me too! It's one of my favorites.
It's so creepy.
I know right? It's one of those books that stays with you long after you've finished it.
It really does.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, I love the outdoors.
Me too! I love hiking and camping.
I love going to new places and exploring.
Me too! I'm always up for trying new things.
What's your favorite place to eat?
I don't really have a favorite place to eat, I'm always up for trying new things.
Me too! I'm always looking for new places to try.
Well, I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too!
It's been nice talking to you!
It's been nice talking to you too
